title: Keeping Secrets
description: Someone is killing closeted gays and lesbians in our nation's capital! Hate crime? Or just plain murder? Investigative reporter Mimi Patterson wants to know and thinks the public should know, too. She won't let anything or anyone keep her from uncovering the truth. After all, the next victim could be someone she knows. Lt. Gianna Maglione wants to keep a tight lid on this case, while she and her Hate Crimes Unit figure out just who would commit such gruesome murders. Why is the FBI involved in her case and who tipped off the press? Mimi and Gianna. Murder. Mystery. Passion.
author: Penny Mickelbury
